statements: SELECT * FROM fuel_consumption_reports WHERE vehicle_id = 1
SELECT report_date,fuel_consumed FROM fuel_consumption_reports WHERE fuel_consumed > 50
SELECT vehicle_id,mileage_at_refuel FROM fuel_consumption_reports WHERE mileage_at_refuel < 10000
SELECT * FROM fuel_consumption_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT vehicle_id,report_date FROM fuel_consumption_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM fuel_consumption_reports WHERE report_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_consumed FROM fuel_consumption_reports WHERE fuel_consumed > 50 ORDER BY vehicle_id DESC;
SELECT mileage_at_refuel FROM fuel_consumption_reports WHERE vehicle_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT vehicle_id, report_date FROM fuel_consumption_reports ORDER BY report_date ASC, vehicle_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(fuel_consumed) as avg_fuel_consumed FROM fuel_consumption_reports WHERE report_date >= '2021-01-01' GROUP BY report_date HAVING AVG(fuel_consumed) > 30;
SELECT * FROM vehicle;
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicle WHERE make = 'Toyota';
SELECT * FROM fuel_consumption ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, make, model, year, fuel_capacity FROM vehicle WHERE year < 2010;
SELECT vehicle_id, SUM(liters_consumed) AS total_liters_consumed FROM fuel_consumption GROUP BY vehicle_id;
SELECT * FROM vehicle JOIN fuel_consumption ON vehicle.vehicle_id = fuel_consumption.vehicle_id WHERE make = 'Toyota';
SELECT make, model, MAX(year) FROM vehicle GROUP BY make, model;
SELECT AVG(liters_consumed) AS avg_consumed, SUM(miles_driven) AS total_miles FROM fuel_consumption WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT vehicle_id, make, model, year, fuel_capacity FROM vehicle ORDER BY year DESC, make ASC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle JOIN fuel_consumption ON vehicle.vehicle_id = fuel_consumption.vehicle_id WHERE model LIKE '%Sedan%' ORDER BY miles_driven DESC;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle;
SELECT brand, model FROM Vehicle WHERE year > 2010;
SELECT * FROM FuelConsumption ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT brand, model, year FROM Vehicle WHERE brand = 'Toyota';
SELECT * FROM Report WHERE report_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle WHERE brand = 'Toyota';
SELECT brand, model, year FROM Vehicle WHERE year > 2010 ORDER BY brand ASC;
SELECT r.report_id, r.report_text, v.brand FROM Report r JOIN Vehicle v ON r.vehicle_id = v.vehicle_id WHERE r.report_id < 1000;
SELECT v.brand, SUM(f.liters) AS total_fuel_consumed FROM Vehicle v INNER JOIN FuelConsumption f ON v.vehicle_id = f.vehicle_id GROUP BY v.brand ORDER BY total_fuel_consumed DESC;
SELECT v.brand, v.model, f.date, f.liters, f.kilometers FROM Vehicle v INNER JOIN FuelConsumption f ON v.vehicle_id = f.vehicle_id WHERE f.date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_model FROM Vehicles ORDER BY vehicle_model DESC;
SELECT * FROM FuelLogs WHERE fuel_amount > 50 ORDER BY log_date ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, SUM(total_fuel_consumed) AS total_fuel_consumed FROM Reports GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING total_fuel_consumed > 100;
SELECT u.username, v.vehicle_model FROM Users u JOIN Vehicles v ON u.user_id = v.vehicle_id;
SELECT * FROM Vehicles WHERE fuel_capacity > 1000 ORDER BY vehicle_model DESC;
SELECT vehicle_model, fuel_capacity FROM Vehicles WHERE vehicle_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT V.vehicle_model, F.log_date, F.fuel_amount FROM Vehicles V INNER JOIN FuelLogs F ON V.vehicle_id = F.vehicle_id WHERE F.fuel_amount > 50 ORDER BY F.log_date ASC;
SELECT R.report_date, R.total_fuel_consumed, V.vehicle_model FROM Reports R INNER JOIN Vehicles V ON R.vehicle_id = V.vehicle_id WHERE R.total_fuel_consumed < 500 ORDER BY R.report_date DESC;

SELECT U.username, V.vehicle_model, F.fuel_amount, R.total_fuel_consumed FROM Users U JOIN Vehicles V ON U.user_id = V.vehicle_id JOIN FuelLogs F ON U.user_id = F.vehicle_id JOIN Reports R ON U.user_id = R.vehicle_id;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_name FROM vehicles WHERE fuel_capacity > 50;
SELECT vehicle_name, fuel_capacity FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM fuel_records ORDER BY fuel_date DESC;
SELECT driver_name, contact_number FROM drivers;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_name, fuel_capacity FROM vehicles WHERE fuel_capacity > 50;
SELECT vehicle_name, fuel_amount, odometer_reading FROM fuel_records WHERE fuel_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT vehicle_name, maintenance_type, maintenance_description FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled Maintenance';
SELECT driver_name, contact_number, vehicle_name, location_name FROM drivers JOIN vehicle_location ON drivers.driver_id = vehicle_location.vehicle_id;
